description:
Data on Marine Protected Areas (including their Take or No-Take status) was obtained from the Offshore
Marine Protected Area project (Sink et al. 2010), while data on terrestrial protected areas which have a
coastal element was obtained from the National Protected Areas Expansion Strategy dataset (DEAT
SANBI, 2009) . Terrestrial protected areas were assigned to the "Take" category unless their entire
coastline was a "No-take" MPA.
keywords: Coast, South Africa, Protection, Marine, Topography, Level, Coast, BiodiversityThe layer was prepared as part of the spatial assessment of the threat status and protection levels of South African marine and coastal ecosystems for the 2011 National Biodiversity Assessment. name: South Africa: Coastal Habitat Protection Level
